mapper.select: select * from noldang.service_center a , noldang.user b where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.service_type = #{type}
mapper.insert: insert into noldang.service_center (user_id, service_type, title, contents, view_count, reg_date, update_date) values(5 , 'Q', #{title}, #{content} , 0 , now(), now())
